scripts.build-win: npm run prebuild && npm run predeploy && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/CliendoIOM-win.exe
scripts.build-mac: npm run predeploy && pkg . --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/CliendoIOM-mac
scripts.build-linux: npm run predeploy && pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/CliendoIOM-linux
scripts.build-all: npm run build-win && npm run build-mac && npm run build-linux
